I have to agree with the comments against split n RAR on this. Except perhaps the use of
the racially offensive word used by cyanidesandwich. The fact remains, there is NO good reason to split n RAR a single 300MB video file that's uploaded via a torrent. It might be
the accepting norm on other older forms of filesharing, but it's a no-no on torrents.

It's needless, pointless, and an absolute waste of time.
